meanings.sent1: The old wallpaper was strippable, making the renovation process much easier.
meanings.sent2: The strippable paint peeled off effortlessly from the walls.
meanings.sent3: The strippable label on the jar made it look like a gift waiting to be unwrapped.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a strippable mask, revealing her true emotions underneath.
meanings.sent5: The strippable tape left no residue when removed, just like magic.

meanings.sent1: The strippable stickers came off cleanly from the book cover.
meanings.sent2: The strippable adhesive allowed for easy repositioning of the posters.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his memory was strippable, as he kept forgetting things.
meanings.sent4: The tension in the room was strippable, making everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent5: The strippable fabric on the couch made cleaning up spills a breeze.

meanings.sent1: The strippable wood was perfect for refinishing projects.
meanings.sent2: The strippable varnish made the furniture restoration process straightforward.
meanings.sent3: She found the strippable costume hilarious, as it revealed more skin than expected.
meanings.sent4: The strippable layers of the onion peeled off easily, one by one.
meanings.sent5: The strippable wax on the floor made it simple to maintain the shine.
